title: 820-00840  - Showing X on battery, previously F4800 shorted by customer
message: hey guys, i have a 820-00840 which im using 820-00875 as schematics and board view, Customer opened the laptop for some reason and shorted F4800 , replaced it and it worked fine, battery was showing X, so i thought maybe he just killed his battery, placed a Known working battery and still X, do you guys think it might just be a bad ISL? Computer seems to still run from battery when unplugged, just shows X , just asking before i try to order.

title: 820-00840  - Showing X on battery, previously F4800 shorted by customer
message:
F4800 shouldn't affect battery.
Did you test the two batteries in other machine?

Post exact voltage for PPBUS_G3H power rail (F7000).
Check diode mode to ground and voltage for SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-00840  - Showing X on battery, previously F4800 shorted by customer
message: Inspect the battery cable that plugs in over the battery screw for any damage first and foremost.
